subtitle: Multidisciplinary practitioner
bio: Curious by nature, always looking for how things work. I am Senna â€“ software developer, construction helper and creator of everything I find interesting.
bio_alt: I'm Senna, a software developer with a passion for creating things - whether it's with code or wood. Besides my work in tech, I regularly help out on construction sites and explore all kinds of projects that create something beautiful or useful.
